Spiderman

Spider-Man, also known as Peter Parker, is a beloved superhero from Marvel Comics. After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider during a school field trip, Peter

gains remarkable spider-like abilities. These include superhuman strength, agility, reflexes, and the ability to cling to most surfaces. His unique “spider sense” warns him of impending danger, making him an extraordinary crime-fighter.

Gwen

Gwen


Stacy, portrayed by Hailee Steinfeld, first appears in Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018). In her origin story, Gwen gains her superhuman spider-powers after being bitten by a radioactive spider.
